purpose: Round a number up to the nearest integer
titleCardParagraphs: The CEIL function in Excel rounds a number up to the nearest integer. This function is crucial in scenarios where precision to the nearest whole number is required, like in inventory management or budget planning.
This page explains how to use Excel's CEIL function in Python using pandas.

paragraphs: The CEIL function in Excel takes a number and rounds it *up* to the nearest integer.

codeSections.title: Confusing CEIL and ROUND
paragraphs: A common mistake is confusing the CEIL function with the ROUND function. CEIL always rounds up, while ROUND rounds to the nearest integer. It's important to choose the correct function based on your rounding requirements.
